New Records: Buddy Hield scored 28 points and Lindy Waters III scored 21 points with a career-high eight rebounds in the Warriors' win over the Pelicans
Key Match Events: The Warriors had a 20-point comeback victory over the Pelicans in their previous meeting
Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors' depth and perimeter shooting were on full display in their previous game against the Pelicans
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors' victory was a crucial step toward building momentum and confidence heading into the upcoming games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram combined for 61 points in the Pelicans' loss to the Warriors
CJ McCollum was limited to five points on 2-for-8 shooting by the Warriors' defense
Others: The game will be played at Chase Center
The Warriors will look to maintain their positive momentum against a familiar opponent
